DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether adult use e-cigarettes every day experience symptom nicotine withdrawal stop use e-cigarettes 6 day .
DOC.brief_title: Does Abstinence From E-cigarettes Produce Withdrawal Symptoms ?
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : The investigator recruit 120 individual long-term daily exclusive user nicotine-containing e-cigarettes . Participants ask use e-cigarette usual first week study stop use e-cigarettes 6 day . The total study duration 14 day . Participants instruct continue abstinence tobacco nicotine product entire study . The investigator use escalate payment system bonus base breath urine sample encourage compliance . Every day study , participant report e-cigarette tobacco cigarette use monitor symptom nicotine withdrawal via phone call Interactive Voice Response system . Participants attend 3 study visit week provide urine breath sample verify compliance , complete brief survey .
